attributes.action: Make feminine hygiene products (i.e sanitary towels and tampax) free to all women
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am sure most women would kindly do without their monthly menstural cycle and we spend 100's of pounds each year buying products which should be given free (as we do not choose to have periods)

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
